Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Rogue was intially a project JL made to see if he could add Blockchain to an ancient game.  He did, now it will serve as a PoC for CC Blockchain games and how they can add additional layers to gamification, trading, and verifications of gameplay.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Looking over how each aspect works with Rogue CC and thinking of possible uses is really quite fun.  I can not wait til many users can easily test it all out and see what a handful of us see.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: What's really important is getting tools for game devs made, then they can come to KMD and add chains to their games.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content:
@Deleted User  I guess the thing to look at here is this.
Game companies would find reasons for blockchain *even if you wouldn't*. 
Game companies can either:
Get their own blockchain devs  (the largest ones most likely will)
OR use something like Komodo to add blockchain to their games (a very large majority of small dev compainies will most likely do this)
